summary: After a drunken house party with his straight mates, Russell heads out to a gay club. Just before closing time he picks up Glen but what's expected to be just a one-night stand becomes something else, something special.
cast: Tom Cullen|Chris New|Jonathan Race|Laura Freeman|Loreto Murray|Jonathan Wright|Sarah Churm|Vauxhall Jermaine|Joe Doherty|Kieran Hardcastle|Mark Devenport|Steve Blackman|Julius Metson Scott|Martin Arrowsmith|Caroline Woolley|Caroline Cawley
title: Weekend
